en: Could you bring me some snacks?
I will pay you, of course.
Is walking not good enough for you?
Don't know how to catch bugs?
Sit still, and wait for the exclamation mark to appear. Then press [INTERACT] to begin focusing.
There is an absence in our possession.
The network is debating our next request, please wait.
Oh! Help me catch the ones with wings.
They keep swarming, and I can't catch them.
I can't figure out how I'm gonna fly like them.
Are you... looking to grow stronger?
There is true power hidden inside you...
C-can you h-help me with something?
I'm just g-gonna rest for a b-bit.
Guess who's still stuck in a crystal.
The crystals are as pleased as I am.
There is so much to dig through!
Ah yes, this will do nicely.
*sniff sniff* Yeah, that's the good stuff...
You hear a static hum? Eeeeelectric!
You know, if you think about it...
Being stuck is just an opportunity to ask for help.
I live to lie here another day.
Oh hey, nice of you to drop by.
